name: Slider for Joomla & K2
body:
## How add images on slider? Create K2 category where is named "Slider" and have alias "slider", after add K2 item and choose this category, now look on your Joomla webiste :)

It work with this [K2 Joomla extension](http://getk2.googlecode.com/files/K2_v2.6.5.zip). Tested on K2 version 2.6.5 and Joomla version 2.5.9. It basic on [Nivo Slider](http://dev7studios.com/nivo-slider/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
